patterns: does the college have library facility
responses:
The college has a well- equipped automated library containing more than 1,18,000 books and 13402 journals. It serves as the hive of academic activities for students, scholars and faculty members in the pursuit of excellence in their respective area of academic pursuits. The library is fully automated with the utilisation of the LIBSYS software. Internet access from the library is available with a small number of computers for staff and students for searching digitized catalogues. Access to online journals and bibliographic databases is provided to the faculty members through the UGC Information and Library Network (INFLIBNET). The efforts to transform into a fully digital library are underway.

For more details visit here

The Placement Cell of Thiagarajar Engineering College,Madurai creates a platform where final year students can showcase their skills & talent which different companies seek to explore. For more information visit here
Our college oragnise various activities related to placements.For latest update visit here

patterns: Tell me about the CSE department
responses: The FIST Supported Computer Science and Engineering Department at TCE has Knowledge Engineering as its theme area. It has Laboratories supported by Microsoft, INTEL, TCS, and HP. The department has completed several R&D projects from RCI, AICTE, UGC, DIT, and DST. As a consortium partner of the CDBR Smart and Secure Environment project, the department collaborates with EMC, VMware, Yahoo India, Adobe, and CTS. It offers six International Certification programs as a Prometric Center and is responsible for the College Management Information System. The department's faculty members have PhDs and publications in National and International Journals.

patterns: Computer Science and Business Systems department
Tell me about the CSBS department
responses: TCE offers a four-year Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech.) degree program in Computer Science and Business Systems (CSBS) in association with Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) since the academic year 2020-21. Approved by AICTE, the program is designed with support from TCS and follows the CDIO framework. Students are trained in emerging topics like Analytics, Machine Learning, Cloud Computing, Cybersecurity, and Internet of Things to ensure industry readiness. The course faculty are also trained by TCS.

patterns: Tell me about the Computer Applications department
What is the Computer Applications department?
Information about the Computer Applications department
responses: The Department of Computer Applications offers the Master of Computer Applications (M.C.A) program, started in 1985, with 'Business Analytics' as its theme area. Recognized as a research center by Anna University, Chennai, the department is supported by qualified faculty members holding PhDs. It has ongoing R&D projects supported by UGC and IBM and maintains a partnership with IBM and Microsoft. The IBM Centre of Excellence Laboratory conducts certification programs in Database Management Systems and related technologies.

patterns: Tell me about the IT department
responses: The Information Technology Department focuses on equipping students with knowledge in computing, software engineering, information processing, and communication technologies. Supported by highly experienced faculty members, the department offers advanced labs and prepares students with the skills required for excelling in the IT industry.

patterns: What can you tell me about the college?
I want to know more about the college.
Can you provide information about the college?
What is special about the college?
Tell me some key facts about the college.
How would you describe the college?
Is the college known for any specific achievements?
What is the college's mission and vision?
Can you give me an overview of the college?
What are the highlights of the college?
What is the college's educational philosophy?
responses: Thiagarajar Engineering College, founded in 1830 as the General Assembly's Institution, is a renowned educational institution in North Calcutta, India. Rev. Alexander Duff, the first missionary from the Church of Scotland to India, established the college with the aim of integrating Western education and Christian mission for the progress of the people. Today, the college upholds its founder's vision by striving for academic excellence, social awareness, and character development. It has produced notable individuals such as Swami Vivekananda and Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose. The college is affiliated with the University of Calcutta and holds autonomous status for its postgraduate studies. It offers undergraduate honors courses in 15 subjects and postgraduate courses in two subjects. Additionally, the college's Department of Teacher Education prepares women students for the Bachelor of Education degree. With its rich heritage and commitment to holistic development, Thiagarajar Engineering College has garnered recognition as one of the top fifty colleges in India. To know more about Our college and college history visit website.

responses: Service learning is an integral part of the college experience. It combines academic learning with community service, allowing students to apply their knowledge and skills to real-world issues. Through service learning, students gain valuable practical experience, develop a sense of civic responsibility, and contribute to the betterment of society. For more details visit website.

The college's service learning program provides students with meaningful opportunities to engage in community service and make a positive impact. Students can participate in various service projects, collaborate with community organizations, and reflect on their experiences to deepen their understanding of social issues. For more details visit website.
